ComicInfo.Summary:
The exciting and climactic ...uh...climax to Deadpool's adventures in the zombie dimension! Can Deadpool and pals find their way back through the Nexus of All Whatchacall to their home dimension? SEE our heroes battle zombie Deadpool before he lost his head. HEAR the hilarious wisecracks of Headpool! SMELL the pungent aroma of rotting zombie corpses. TASTE whatever snack you usually enjoy while reading stuff.
Notes:
The cover is a homage and a parody of the movie poster for Silence of the Lambs.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:46:46. [CVDB225805]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bong Dazo, Kyle Baker, Matteo Scalera
ComicInfo.Inker: Jose Pimentel, Kyle Baker, Matteo Scalera
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Aquarian, Ashcroft, Bill, Agent of A.I.M., Contemplator, Deadpool, Doctor Voodoo, Dr. Betty, Jennifer Kale, Man-Thing, Piledriver, Siege, Sub-Commander Blake, Wrecker, Zombie Deadpool
ComicInfo.Teams: A.I.M., The Command, Wrecking Crew, Zombies
